heading: National Science Week Hackathon
description: An offline hackathon at IIT Kharagpur focused on building a course recommendation website using ML. The platform filtered courses based on CGPA goals, profiles, and interests. It featured intuitive UI design, collaborative development, and expert mentorship.

heading: INNOVATE4SWADESHI
description: An online AI-focused hackathon in partnership with Swadeshi Bytes tackling SME operations, campus interaction, and content creation. It featured three problem statements, mentorship from industry experts, and a prize pool of 50k INR.

heading: Hack-an-Intern
description: A major tech event sponsored by Density with 300+ participants exploring AI, blockchain, and emerging tech. Included workshops by industry veterans, hands-on coding, and networking. Prize pool worth 2 lakhs INR for top performers.

heading: Blockchain Hackathon
description: An online hackathon by Nuvepro with 400+ participants and 50 teams developing blockchain-based solutions. The event featured expert-led workshops, coding sessions, and industry interactions. Total prize pool was 40k INR.

heading: Concordia
description: A global online hackathon sponsored by Graviton and Concordium with 60 teams and a prize pool over $100k. Participants tackled complex challenges through collaboration, workshops, and networking. Emphasized innovation and professional growth.

heading: Web3.0 Summer Training Program
description: A 4-week online training with Lumos teaching full-stack Web3.0 development. Covered JavaScript, React, blockchain, and smart contracts. Participants engaged in hands-on projects, interactive sessions, and collaborative learning.

heading: Web3 & Aptos Session
description: An online session by Move Developers for 300+ participants exploring Web3 and Aptos. Included deep-dive presentations, practical workshops, and networking with tech professionals. Aimed at bridging gaps in emerging tech.
